WorkItem.Description:
RAWR advised to put an Insightful Earthsiege Diamond into a helm, which requires one blue, one yellow, and one red gems.  However, under several different gear optimizations, the only gems suggested were yellow.  No red, no blue.  Hence it seems to be an invalid recommendation.
Â 
Shouldn't meta gem requirements be taken into account?  (I read in a post of last year that there was such a checkbox in the Options panel, but in v2.2.17 I see no such option.)
WorkItem.Summary: Meta Gem Requirements Not Honored for Druid

Comments.Message:
/facepalm

'Enforce Gem Requirements' is a checkbox on the Stats Pane just under the Model selector

Suggestion.  Since this issue comes up so often, why not make the "Enforce Gem Requirements" ON by default.  Also, a tooltip that explains that this also applies to the meta gem issue might reduce the confusion.
It is on by default for the next major version already. A tooltip is already on that checkbox that clearly explains exactly what you ask about.
